home.paragraph1: We are proud to celebrate one year as an independent, grassroots organization empowering diverse women in technology careers. Despite having a shoestring budget and a volunteer team, we produce high-quality, free events, both online and in-person.
home.paragraph2: Formerly known as Women Who Code Tokyo, we started in 2014 organizing community events at various tech companies. Our events give a platform for women to demonstrate technical excellence, network, and gain career skills.
home.paragraph3: We believe in the strength of women, and envision a world where women thrive at every level of the technology industry. Come build the future with us.
home.whoShouldJoin: Who should join: Our average member has 2 or more years of career experience, and we welcome beginners to seasoned professionals. While we champion women's empowerment, all genders are welcome at our events. Software-adjacent roles like Data Science, Product, Platform, UI/UX, Machine Learning, and more are welcome.
